alert.note: Alert for Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk County through 700 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hauppauge, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Centereach, Medford, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Middle Island, Coram, Holbrook, Farmingville, Mount Sinai, Yaphank, Central Islip, Lake Ronkonkoma and Selden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
